Why “Tragicomic”?

In the context of Fun Home, we may easily think that the word “tragicomic” is a combination of the words “tragic” and “comic”--the word ”tragic”, referring to the tragedy of the text, and “comic”, referring to the text being in the form of a graphic novel.




Tragedy + Comedy

The Merriam-Webster dictionary defines “tragicomic” as a situation that harnesses the aspects of both tragedy and comedy.
